ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,5}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 4
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=1000, width=1000,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-1.25,0.1,6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-1.25,0.3,7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={1.25,0.3,6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
          font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-1.25,0.3,8}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
            font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

          if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={1.25,0.3,8}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
                    font_size=230, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={1.25,0.3,7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
                    font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
            font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={1.4,1,5.85}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-1.4,1,5.85}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={5.85,0.1,0}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=500, width=1200,
        font_size=300, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local bagGUID = "93ad9a"

local Centre_Ville = "e00021"
local Quartier_Nord = "e00026"
local Quartier_Est = "e00022"
local Vide_Sideral = "e0002a"

GurathnakaFamelique = "3b7ce3"
GurathnakaAffame = "d0b469"
GurathnakaVorace = "2f2691"
GurathnakaRassasie = "797653"
GurathnakaRepus = "d1a1d3"

local place_Centre_Ville = {6.00, 1.51, 3.50}
local place_Quartier_Nord = {6.00, 1.51, 20.50}
local place_Quartier_Est = {-2.00, 1.51, 12.00}
local place_Vide_Sideral = {14.00, 1.51, 12.00}
local place_Gurathnaka = {17.00, 1.51, 12.00}

local place_premier_MiniCard = {-4.00, 1.51, 12.00}

local place_premier_ennemi_faiblesse = {-4.50, 1.51, 15.00}

function onLoad()

    self.createButton({
        click_function = "placeLieu",
        function_owner = self,
        label = "Activer",
        position = {0, 0.2, 3},
        rotation = {0, 0, 0},
        scale = {1, 1, 1},
        width = 1200,
        height = 400,
        font_size = 250,
        color = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color = {1, 1, 1}
    })

end

function placeLieu()

  local bagObjects = self.getObjects()
  if #bagObjects ~= 4 then
      broadcastToAll("Le sac doit contenir exactement 4 éléments.")
      return
  end

  local zoneDeJeuGUID = "2b5a73"

  playerMinicard = {}
  playerWeakness = {}
  playerClue = {}
  playerEnemy = {}
  playerLocation = {}

  -- On recupere tous les objets du plateau de jeu
  local zoneDeJeu = { 5.77, 1.38, 13.77 }
  local zoneDeJeuScale = { 41.00, 3.00, 37.00 }
  local hitlist = Physics.cast({
      origin       = zoneDeJeu,
      direction    = { 0, 1, 0 },
      type         = 3,
      size         = zoneDeJeuScale,
      max_distance = 0,
      debug        = false,
  })

  local Gurathnaka = nil

  for _, obj in ipairs(hitlist) do

        local object = obj.hit_object

        if object ~= nil then

          local GmNote = object.getGMNotes()
          if GmNote ~= nil then
            if GmNote == "Clue" then
              table.insert(playerClue, object)
            end
          end

          if object.type == 'Card' and object.getName() ~= 'Set up connections' then
            local cardData = object.getData()
            local metadata = Global.call('getMetadata', cardData)

            if metadata and metadata.type == 'Minicard' then
              table.insert(playerMinicard, object)
            end

            if metadata and metadata.weakness ~= nil then
              table.insert(playerWeakness, object)
            end

            if metadata and metadata.type == 'Location' then
              table.insert(playerLocation, object)
            end

            if metadata and metadata.type == 'Enemy' and metadata.weakness == nil and
                object.getGUID() ~= GurathnakaFamelique and object.getGUID() ~= GurathnakaAffame and
                object.getGUID() ~= GurathnakaVorace and object.getGUID() ~= GurathnakaRassasie and object.getGUID() ~= GurathnakaRepus then
              table.insert(playerEnemy, object)
            end

            if object.getGUID() == GurathnakaFamelique or object.getGUID() == GurathnakaAffame or
               object.getGUID() == GurathnakaVorace or object.getGUID() == GurathnakaRassasie or object.getGUID() == GurathnakaRepus then
              Gurathnaka = object
            end

          end
        end
  end

  -- Defausser les ennemis non faiblesse : "Type":"Enemy" et non "weakness": "true" et non Gurantaka
  local deckTarget = nil
  local discardDeckPos = {x = 35.0, y = 3.00, z = -3.0}

  local hitDiscard = Physics.cast({
      origin       = discardDeckPos,
      direction    = {0, 1, 0},
      type         = 3,
      size         = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5},
      max_distance = 0,
      debug        = false
  })

  for _, obj in ipairs(hitDiscard) do
      if obj.hit_object.tag == "Deck" then
          deckTarget = obj.hit_object
      end
  end

  if deckTarget then
    for _, card in ipairs(playerEnemy) do
      deckTarget.putObject(card)
      card.setRotationSmooth({0,180,0}) -- face révélée
    end
  else
    for _, card in ipairs(playerEnemy) do
        card.setPositionSmooth(discardDeckPos)
        card.setRotationSmooth({0,180,0})
    end

  end

  -- Enlever les lieux existants
  for _, card in ipairs(playerLocation) do
    self.putObject(card)
  end

  -- Enlever les indices
  for _, clue in ipairs(playerClue) do
    clue.destruct()
  end

  -- Mettre en jeu les lieux
  self.takeObject(
        {
          guid = Centre_Ville,
          position = place_Centre_Ville,
          rotation = {0, 180, 180},
          smooth = true,
        })

    self.takeObject(
          {
            guid = Quartier_Nord,
            position = place_Quartier_Nord,
            rotation = {0, 180, 180},
            smooth = true,
          })

    self.takeObject(
          {
            guid = Quartier_Est,
            position = place_Quartier_Est,
            rotation = {0, 180, 180},
            smooth = true,
          })

    self.takeObject(
          {
            guid = Vide_Sideral,
            position = place_Vide_Sideral,
            rotation = {0, 180, 180},
            smooth = true,
          })

    -- Retourner Qurantaka et placer dans vide Vide_Sideral
    if Gurathnaka ~= nil then
      Gurathnaka.setPosition(place_Gurathnaka)
      Gurathnaka.setRotation({0, 180, 180})
    end

    -- Deplacer Investigator et ennemi faiblesse dans quartier est
    local place = place_premier_MiniCard
    for _, invest in ipairs(playerMinicard) do
      if invest ~= nil then
        invest.setPosition(place)
        place[1] = place[1] - 1.5
      end
    end

    -- local place_ennemi = place_premier_ennemi_faiblesse
    -- for _, ennemi in ipairs(playerWeakness) do
    --  ennemi.setPositionSmooth(place_ennemi,false,false)
    --  place_ennemi[1] = place_ennemi[1] - 2.5
    -- end

end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local bagGUID = "f31ff5"

local PlaceDeckAliceGUID = "19ae83"

local Origine_Ombres1 = "e0002b"
local Origine_Ombres2 = "3fbc8a"
local Origine_Ombres3 = "3507ea"

local Compassion1 = "e00008"
local Compassion2 = "e00007"
local Courage1 = "e0000a"
local Courage2 = "027ab8"
local Curiosite1 = "77449d"
local Curiosite2 = "575ed7"
local Intuition1 = "28e549"
local Intuition2 = "afc6a2"
local Patience1 = "3e6d4b"
local Patience2 = "483941"
local Raison1 = "b3fb68"
local Raison2 = "e00012"
local Freres_Armes = "e0000c"
local Fin_de_Reigne = "e0000b"
local Retour_Galomphant = "e00017"
local Gloire_Honneur = "e00018"
local Soudainement_Evanouis = "3b3a94"
local Seul_Survivant = "e00013"
local Gueule_qui_Mord = "e00019"
local Soupir_Profond = "e00011"
local En_Retard = "e00010"
local Aucun_Survivant = "e0000e"
local Faute_Clou = "e0002e"
local Table_Vide = "e0000d"
local Absence_Compassion1 = "e0001b"
local Absence_Compassion2 = "e0001a"
local Absence_Courage1 = "e0001c"
local Absence_Courage2 = "e0001d"
local Absence_Curiosite1 = "e0001f"
local Absence_Curiosite2 = "e0001e"
local Absence_Intuition1 = "cee756"
local Absence_Intuition2 = "e00020"
local Absence_Patience1 = "a5dafe"
local Absence_Patience2 = "e00023"
local Absence_Raison1 = "e00024"
local Absence_Raison2 = "e00025"
local Qualites_Snark = "e00027"
local Decret_Royal = "e0000f"
local Temps_File = "3cf869"
local Diverses_Choses = "de802a"
local Meilleur_Beurre = "e00014"
local Mere_Surete = "cdccc5"
local Jugement_Reine = "e00034"
local Pas_Poli = "e00015"

lapin_survecu = "faux"
appetit_Morse = "faux"
chapelier_apprecie = "faux"
lievre_supporte = "faux"
chapelier_supporte = "faux"
reine_detruit = "faux"
snarck_perdu = "faux"
jabberwock = "faux"
bb_bb = "faux"
frere_appris = "faux"
roi_celebre = "faux"
chevalier_content = "faux"

local intuition = "faux"
local patience = "faux"
local compassion = "faux"
local courage = "faux"
local raison = "faux"
local curiosite = "faux"


function onLoad()

  self.createButton({
      click_function = "creer_deck",
      function_owner = self,
      label = "Constituer le Deck Alice",
      position = {5.5, 0.2, 14},
      rotation = {0, 0, 0},
      scale = {1, 1, 1},
      width = 2800,
      height = 380,
      font_size = 250,
      color = {0, 0, 0},
      font_color = {1, 1, 1}
  })


    self.createButton({
        click_function = "ranger",
        function_owner = self,
        label = "Ranger",
        position = {10.3, 0.2, 14},
        rotation = {0, 0, 0},
        scale = {1, 1, 1},
        width = 1000,
        height = 380,
        font_size = 250,
        color = {0, 0, 0},
        font_color = {1, 1, 1}
    })



  end

function debug(num_debug)
  -- broadcastToAll("ligne debug : " .. num_debug)
end


function creer_deck()

  local bag = getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID)

  debug(1)

  local PlaceDeckAlice = getObjectFromGUID(PlaceDeckAliceGUID)
  PlaceDeckAlice.setLock(true)

  local bagObjects = bag.getObjects()
  --Verifie qu'il y a bien 47 elements
  if #bagObjects ~= 47 then
      broadcastToAll("Le sac doit contenir exactement 47 éléments.")
      return
  end

  place_dans_deck(Origine_Ombres1)
  place_dans_deck(Origine_Ombres2)
  place_dans_deck(Origine_Ombres3)

  debug(2)

  debug (3)
  if lapin_survecu == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Temps_File) else place_dans_deck(En_Retard) end
  debug (4)
  if appetit_Morse == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Diverses_Choses) else place_dans_deck(Soupir_Profond) end
  debug (5)
  if chapelier_apprecie == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Meilleur_Beurre)
  else
    --Modif 31/07 : On place la ligne du lievre_supporte ou chapelier_supporte dans else, car elle ne doit s'appliquer que si chapelier_apprecie est faux
    debug (6)
    if lievre_supporte == "vrai" or chapelier_supporte == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Pas_Poli) else place_dans_deck(Table_Vide) end
  end
  debug (7)
  if reine_detruit == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Jugement_Reine) else place_dans_deck(Fin_de_Reigne) end
  debug (8)
  if snarck_perdu == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Soudainement_Evanouis) else place_dans_deck(Qualites_Snark) end
  debug (9)
  if jabberwock == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Retour_Galomphant) else place_dans_deck(Gueule_qui_Mord) end
  debug (10)
  if bb_bb == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Freres_Armes) end
  if frere_appris == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Seul_Survivant) end
  if bb_bb == "faux"and frere_appris == "faux" then place_dans_deck(Aucun_Survivant) end
  debug (12)
  if roi_celebre == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Decret_Royal) else place_dans_deck(Faute_Clou) end
  debug (13)
  if chevalier_content == "vrai" then place_dans_deck(Gloire_Honneur) else place_dans_deck(Mere_Surete) end
  debug (14)


  if intuition == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Intuition1)
    place_dans_deck(Intuition2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Intuition1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Intuition2)
  end

  if patience == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Patience1)
    place_dans_deck(Patience2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Patience1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Patience2)
  end

  if compassion == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Compassion1)
    place_dans_deck(Compassion2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Compassion1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Compassion2)
  end

  if courage == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Courage1)
    place_dans_deck(Courage2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Courage1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Courage2)
  end

  if raison == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Raison1)
    place_dans_deck(Raison2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Raison1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Raison2)
  end

  if curiosite == "vrai" then
    place_dans_deck(Curiosite1)
    place_dans_deck(Curiosite2)
  else
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Curiosite1)
    place_dans_deck(Absence_Curiosite2)
  end

end

function place_dans_deck(carteID)

  local bag = getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID)

  local bagObjects = bag.getObjects()

  local PlaceDeckAlice = getObjectFromGUID(PlaceDeckAliceGUID)
  local place_DECK = PlaceDeckAlice.getPosition()

  --Si l'ID n'est pas nul{}

  debug("carteID = " .. carteID)

  if  carteID ~= nil then

    bag.takeObject(
        {
          guid = carteID,
          position = place_DECK,
          rotation = {0, 180, 180},
          smooth = true,
        })

  end

  Wait.time(
    function()
        melange_deck_Alice()
    end,
    2
  )

  debug("carteID = " .. carteID)

end


function melange_deck_Alice()

  local PlaceDeckAlice = getObjectFromGUID(PlaceDeckAliceGUID)
  local place_DECK = PlaceDeckAlice.getPosition()

  local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin = place_DECK,
        direction = {0, 1, 0},
        type = 3,               --1 = Rayon, 2 = Sphère, 3= Box
        debug = false,           -- true permet d'apercevoir la zone une fraction de seconde
        size = {4,4,4},
        orientation = {0,0,0},
        max_distance = 0        -- si >0, la zone se déplace dans l'espace, dans sa direction
    })

    for _, obj in ipairs(hitList) do
        local trouve = obj.hit_object
        if trouve.type == 'Deck' then

          trouve.shuffle()

        end
    end


end

function ranger()

  local bag = getObjectFromGUID(bagGUID)

  local PlaceDeckAlice = getObjectFromGUID(PlaceDeckAliceGUID)
  local place_DECK = PlaceDeckAlice.getPosition()


  local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin = place_DECK,
        direction = {0, 1, 0},
        type = 3,               --1 = Rayon, 2 = Sphère, 3= Box
        debug = false,           -- true permet d'apercevoir la zone une fraction de seconde
        size = {4,4,4},
        orientation = {0,0,0},
        max_distance = 0        -- si >0, la zone se déplace dans l'espace, dans sa direction
    })

    for _, obj in ipairs(hitList) do
        local trouve = obj.hit_object
        if trouve.type == 'Deck' then

          local nb_carte = trouve.getQuantity()

          for i = 1, nb_carte do
              trouve.takeObject({
                  callback_function = function(spawnedObject)
                      Wait.frames(function()
                          if not spawnedObject.isDestroyed() then
                              self.putObject(spawnedObject)
                          end
                      end)
                  end,
                  smooth = false,
              })
          end

        end
    end

end

function findHitsInRadius(pos, radius)
    local radius = (radius or 1)
    local hitList = Physics.cast({
        origin       = pos,
        direction    = {0,1,0},
        type         = 2,
        size         = {radius,radius,radius},
        max_distance = 0,
        debug        = true,
    })

    return hitList
end

  if lapin_survecu == "vrai" then
     lapin_survecu = "faux"
   else

  broadcastToAll("------------------------------------------------------------")

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Model_Bag
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
-- Utility memory bag by Directsun
-- Version 2.7.0
-- Fork of Memory Bag 2.0 by MrStump
--
-- Want to contribute? Create an issue or fork the code on GitHub and submit a pull request:
-- https://github.com/sunflowermans/TTS-UtilityMemoryBag


function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {["ml"]=memoryList}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
        local data = bagObj.lua_script_state
        if data ~= nil then
            local j = JSON.decode(data)
            if j ~= nil and j.ml ~= nil then
                for guid, entry in pairs(j.ml) do
                    memoryList[guid] = entry
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function updateMemoryWithMoves()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    --get the first transposed object's coordinates
    local obj = getObjectFromGUID(moveGuid)

    -- p1 is where needs to go, p2 is where it was
    local refObjPos = memoryList[moveGuid].pos
    local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(obj.getPosition(), refObjPos, nil)
    local movedRotation = obj.getRotation()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        memoryList[guid].pos.x = entry.pos.x - deltaPos.x
        memoryList[guid].pos.y = entry.pos.y - deltaPos.y
        memoryList[guid].pos.z = entry.pos.z - deltaPos.z
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.x = movedRotation.x
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.y = movedRotation.y
        -- memoryList[guid].rot.z = movedRotation.z
    end

    --theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
    --    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
    --    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
    --    lock=obj.getLock()
    --}
    moveList = {}
end

function onload(saved_data)

    fresh = true
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        --Set up information off of loaded_data
        memoryList = loaded_data.ml
    else
        --Set up information for if there is no saved saved data
        memoryList = {}

    end

    moveList = {}
    moveGuid = nil

    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        fresh = false
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
end


--Beginning Setup


--Make setup button
 function createSetupButton()
    self.createButton({
      label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.1,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
 end

--Triggered by Transpose button
function buttonClick_transpose()
    moveGuid = nil
    broadcastToAll("Select one object and move it- all objects will move relative to the new location", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(true)
    createSetupActionButtons(true)
end

--Triggered by setup button,
function buttonClick_setup()
    memoryListBackup = duplicateTable(memoryList)
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createButtonsOnAllObjects(false)
    createSetupActionButtons(false)
end

function getAllObjectsInMemory()
    local objTable = {}
    local curObj = {}

    for guid in pairs(memoryListBackup) do
        curObj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        table.insert(objTable, curObj)
    end

    return objTable
    -- return getAllObjects()
end

--Creates selection buttons on objects
function createButtonsOnAllObjects(move)
    buttonIndexMap = {}
    local howManyButtons = 0

    local objsToHaveButtons = {}
    if move == true then
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjectsInMemory()
    else
        objsToHaveButtons = getAllObjects()
    end

    for _, obj in ipairs(objsToHaveButtons) do
        if obj ~= self then
            --On a normal bag, the button positions aren't the same size as the bag.
            globalScaleFactor = 1* 1/self.getScale().x
            --Super sweet math to set button positions
            local selfPos = self.getPosition()
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            local deltaPos = findOffsetDistance(selfPos, objPos, obj)
            local objPos = rotateLocalCoordinates(deltaPos, self)
            objPos.x = -objPos.x * globalScaleFactor
            objPos.y = objPos.y * globalScaleFactor + 2
            objPos.z = objPos.z * globalScaleFactor * 0.9
            --Workaround for custom PDFs
            if obj.Book then
                objPos.y = objPos.y + 0.5
            end
            --Offset rotation of bag
            local rot = self.getRotation()
            rot.y = -rot.y + 180
            --Create function
            local funcName = "selectButton_" .. howManyButtons
            local func = function() buttonClick_selection(obj, move) end
            local color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
            local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
            if move == true then
                color = colorMove
            end
            self.setVar(funcName, func)
            self.createButton({
                click_function=funcName, function_owner=self,
                position=objPos, rotation=rot, height=500, width=500,
                color=color,
            })
            buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()] = howManyButtons
            howManyButtons = howManyButtons + 1
        end
    end
end

--Creates submit and cancel buttons
function createSetupActionButtons(move)
    self.createButton({
        label="Annuler", click_function="buttonClick_cancel", function_owner=self,
      position={-0.7,0.1,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
      font_size=145, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    self.createButton({
        label="Valider", click_function="buttonClick_submit", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    if move == false then
      self.createButton({
          label="Ajouter", click_function="buttonClick_add", function_owner=self,
          position={0.7,0.3,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
          font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.25,1,0.25}
      })

        self.createButton({
            label="Sélection", click_function="editDragSelection", function_owner=self,
            position={-0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=125, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })

        if fresh == false then
                self.createButton({
                    label="Mise à jour", click_function="buttonClick_setNew", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,3.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=105, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
                })
                self.createButton({
                    label="Retirer", click_function="buttonClick_remove", function_owner=self,
                    position={0.7,0.3,2.6}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
                    font_size=140, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,0.25,0.25}
                })
            end
        end

        self.createButton({
            label="Reset", click_function="buttonClick_reset", function_owner=self,
            position={0,0.3,-2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
            font_size=165, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
        })
    end


--During Setup


--Checks or unchecks buttons
function buttonClick_selection(obj, move)
    local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
    local colorMove = {0,0,1,0.6}
    local color = {0,1,0,0.6}

    previousGuid = selectedGuid
    selectedGuid = obj.getGUID()

    theList = memoryList
    if move == true then
        theList = moveList
        if previousGuid ~= nil and previousGuid ~= selectedGuid then
            local prevObj = getObjectFromGUID(previousGuid)
            prevObj.highlightOff()
            self.editButton({index=previousIndex, color=colorMove})
            theList[previousGuid] = nil
        end
        previousIndex = index
    end

    if theList[selectedGuid] == nil then
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        --Adding pos/rot to memory table
        local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
        --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = {
            pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
            rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
            lock=obj.getLock(),
            tint=obj.getColorTint()
        }
        obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
    else
        color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
        if move == true then
            color = colorMove
        end
        self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
        theList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

function editDragSelection(bagObj, player, remove)
    local selectedObjs = Player[player].getSelectedObjects()
    if not remove then
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            --Ignore if already in the memory list, or does not have a button
            if index and not memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                self.editButton({index=index, color={0,1,0,0.6}})
                --Adding pos/rot to memory table
                local pos, rot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
                --I need to add it like this or it won't save due to indexing issue
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = {
                    pos={x=round(pos.x,4), y=round(pos.y,4), z=round(pos.z,4)},
                    rot={x=round(rot.x,4), y=round(rot.y,4), z=round(rot.z,4)},
                    lock=obj.getLock(),
                    tint=obj.getColorTint()
                }
                obj.highlightOn({0,1,0})
            end
        end
    else
        for _, obj in ipairs(selectedObjs) do
            local index = buttonIndexMap[obj.getGUID()]
            if index and memoryList[obj.getGUID()] then
                color = {0.75,0.25,0.25,0.6}
                self.editButton({index=index, color=color})
                memoryList[obj.getGUID()] = nil
                obj.highlightOff()
            end
        end
    end
end

--Cancels selection process
function buttonClick_cancel()
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    moveList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    if next(memoryList) == nil then
        createSetupButton()
    else
        createMemoryActionButtons()
    end
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Sélection annulée", {1,1,1})
    moveGuid = nil
end

--Saves selections
function buttonClick_submit()
    fresh = false
    if next(moveList) ~= nil then
        for guid in pairs(moveList) do
            moveGuid = guid
        end
        if memoryListBackup[moveGuid] == nil then
            broadcastToAll("Item selected for moving is not already in memory", {1, 0.25, 0.25})
        else
            broadcastToAll("Moving all items in memory relative to new objects position!", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            createMemoryActionButtons()
            local count = 0
            for guid in pairs(moveList) do
                moveGuid = guid
                count = count + 1
                local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
                if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
            end
            updateMemoryWithMoves()
            updateSave()
            buttonClick_place()
        end
    elseif next(memoryList) == nil and moveGuid == nil then
        memoryList = memoryListBackup
        broadcastToAll("No selections made.", {0.75, 0.25, 0.25})
    end
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
    moveGuid = nil
end

function combineTables(first_table, second_table)
    for k,v in pairs(second_table) do first_table[k] = v end
end

function buttonClick_add()
    fresh = false
    combineTables(memoryList, memoryListBackup)
    broadcastToAll("Adding internal bags and selections to existing memory", {0.25, 0.75, 0.25})
    combineMemoryFromBagsWithin()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_remove()
    broadcastToAll("Removing Selected Entries From Memory", {1.0, 0.25, 0.25})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for guid in pairs(memoryList) do
        count = count + 1
        memoryListBackup[guid] = nil
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then obj.highlightOff() end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Removed", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

function buttonClick_setNew()
    broadcastToAll("Setting new position relative to items in memory", {0.75, 0.75, 1})
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createMemoryActionButtons()
    local count = 0
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        guid = obj.guid
        if memoryListBackup[guid] ~= nil then
            count = count + 1
            memoryListBackup[guid].pos = obj.getPosition()
            memoryListBackup[guid].rot = obj.getRotation()
            memoryListBackup[guid].lock = obj.getLock()
            memoryListBackup[guid].tint = obj.getColorTint()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll(count.." Objects Saved", {1,1,1})
    memoryList = memoryListBackup
    updateSave()
end

--Resets bag to starting status
function buttonClick_reset()
    fresh = true
    memoryList = {}
    self.clearButtons()
    self.clearInputs()
    createSetupButton()
    removeAllHighlights()
    broadcastToAll("Tool Reset", {1,1,1})
    updateSave()
end


--After Setup


--Creates recall and place buttons
function createMemoryActionButtons()
    self.createButton({
        label="Placer", click_function="buttonClick_place", function_owner=self,
        position={0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Ranger", click_function="buttonClick_recall", function_owner=self,
        position={-0.7,0.1,2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Config", click_function="buttonClick_setup", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.1,-2.2}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=275, width=625,
        font_size=150, color={0,0,0}, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ---    self.createButton({
    ---      label="Bouger", click_function="buttonClick_transpose", function_owner=self,
    ---      position={-2,0.3,0.8}, rotation={0,270,0}, height=350, width=800,
    ---      font_size=250, color={0,0,0}, font_color={0.75,0.75,1}
    ---
end

--Sends objects from bag/table to their saved position/rotation
function buttonClick_place()
    local bagObjList = self.getObjects()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        --If obj is out on the table, move it to the saved pos/rot
        if obj ~= nil then
            obj.setPositionSmooth(entry.pos)
            obj.setRotationSmooth(entry.rot)
            obj.setLock(entry.lock)
            obj.setColorTint(entry.tint)
        else
            --If obj is inside of the bag
            for _, bagObj in ipairs(bagObjList) do
                if bagObj.guid == guid then
                    local item = self.takeObject({
                        guid=guid, position=entry.pos, rotation=entry.rot, smooth=false
                    })
                    item.setLock(entry.lock)
                    item.setColorTint(entry.tint)
                    break
                end
            end
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets placés", {1,1,1})
end

--Recalls objects to bag from table
function buttonClick_recall()
    for guid, entry in pairs(memoryList) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj ~= nil then self.putObject(obj) end
    end
    broadcastToAll("Objets rangés", {1,1,1})
end


--Utility functions


--Find delta (difference) between 2 x/y/z coordinates
function findOffsetDistance(p1, p2, obj)
    local yOffset = 0
    if obj ~= nil then
        local bounds = obj.getBounds()
        yOffset = (bounds.size.y - bounds.offset.y)
    end
    local deltaPos = {}
    deltaPos.x = (p2.x-p1.x)
    deltaPos.y = (p2.y-p1.y) + yOffset
    deltaPos.z = (p2.z-p1.z)
    return deltaPos
end

--Used to rotate a set of coordinates by an angle
function rotateLocalCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local objPos, objRot = obj.getPosition(), obj.getRotation()
    local angle = math.rad(objRot.y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.cos(angle) - desiredPos.z * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle) + desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    --return {x=objPos.x+x, y=objPos.y+desiredPos.y, z=objPos.z+z}
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

function rotateMyCoordinates(desiredPos, obj)
    local angle = math.rad(obj.getRotation().y)
    local x = desiredPos.x * math.sin(angle)
    local z = desiredPos.z * math.cos(angle)
    return {x=x, y=desiredPos.y, z=z}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

--Duplicates a table (needed to prevent it making reference to the same objects)
function duplicateTable(oldTable)
    local newTable = {}
    for k, v in pairs(oldTable) do
        newTable[k] = v
    end
    return newTable
end

--Moves scripted highlight from all objects
function removeAllHighlights()
    for _, obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
        obj.highlightOff()
    end
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
    local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end


--[[
This object provides access to a variable stored on the "Global script".
The variable holds the GUIDs for every Utility Memory Bag in the scene.
Example:
{'805ebd', '35cc21', 'fc8886', 'f50264', '5f5f63'}
--]]
AllMemoryBagsInScene = {
    NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE = "_UtilityMemoryBag_AllMemoryBagsInScene"
}

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:add(guid)
    local guids = Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
    table.insert(guids, guid)
    Global.setTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE, guids)
end

function AllMemoryBagsInScene:getGuidList()
    return Global.getTable(self.NAME_OF_GLOBAL_VARIABLE) or {}
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
--[[    Character Sheet Template    by: MrStump

You can set up your own character sheet if you follow these steps.

Step 1) Change the character sheet image
    -Right click on the character sheet, click Custom
    -Replace the image URL with one for your character sheet
    -Click import, make sure your sheet loads
    -SAVE THE GAME (the table setup)
    -LOAD FROM THAT SAVE YOU JUST MADE

Step 2) Edit script to fit your character sheet
    -Below you will see some general options, and then the big data table
    -The data table is what determines how many of which buttons are made
        -Checkboxes
        -Counters
        -Textboxes
    -By default, there are 3 of each. You can add more or remove entries
    -If you intend to add/remove, be sure only to add/remove ENTRIES
        -This is what an entry looks like:
            {
                pos   = {-0.977,0.1,-0.589},
                size  = 800,
                state = false
            },
        -Deleting the whole thing would remove that specific item on the sheet
        -Copy and pasting it after another entry would create another
    -Each entry type has unique data points (pos, size, state, etc)
        -Do not try to add in your own data points or remove them individually
        -There is a summary of what each point does at the top of its category

Step 3) Save and check script changes
    -Hit Save & Apply in the script window to save your code
    -You can edit your code as needed and Save+Apply as often as needed
    -When you are finished, make disableSave = false below then Save+apply
        -This enables saving, so your sheet will remember whats on it.

Bonus) Finding/Editing Positions for elements
    I have included a tool to get positions for buttons in {x,y,z} form
    Place it where you want the center of your element to be
    Then copy the table from the notes (lower right of screen)
        You can highlight it and CTRL+C
    Paste it into the data table where needed (pos=)
    If you want to manually tweek the values:
        {0,0,0} is the center of the character sheet
        {1,0,0} is right, {-1,0,0} is left
        {0,0,-1} is up, {0,0,1} is down
        0.1 for Y is the height off of the page.
            If it was 0, it would be down inside the model of the sheet

Begin editing below:    ]]
